name: Workshop in the Ironwood Grove
description:
A submission for the RTP Only Jam.

Follow the young Elven scholar Nell and her sister Neris as they venture into the Ironwood Grove, at the request of Professor Matthias- but beware, for it's home to ferocious monsters, and a fell scheme is being hatched in the shadows...

Switch between different forms and weapons to adapt to different threats and overcome different obstacles. The game can be completed in just over an hour, but there's plenty of backstory to discover and dialogue to read if the player goes looking for it.
